input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with Security Systems

Found unauthorized access attempts on medical data systems You can reach me at omar.hassan@secure.net.. Could have happened due to outdated security protocols. So far, we've reviewed the updated antivirus software and checked user permissions My name is Carlos Mendoza.. Worried about a potential breach of sensitive information and need help with a thorough investigation and implementing further security measures to prevent future incidents.
